txt.en: 'The Well serves only me!'
'You are not fit to drink these waters!'
'By going further into the well...'
'You only assure your own destruction.'
'You aren't here for water.'
'Blood or water, friends. You know the rules.'

Deep in the war-torn lands of Imhûlar, locals warn you of an Ordâkhai encampment, a trading post of sorts. It is known as Tûl Zakana, the Well of Forgetting, whose waters will make you forget your troubles, and, if you drink enough, even who you are. But unless you are trading for this water, it's best to stay well clear of the Well, for many have vanished near it, never to be seen again. You are now tasked by the families of the vanished with investigating the Well and its secrets.
'Well, it looks like you've made your choice.'
'No, I've seen your kind here before.
'We have strict rules about causing trouble at the Well.'
'Unfortunate. You've come all this way to die on our sands.'
'Blood it shall be.'
Defeat the Pahór-korat, the Hands of Forgetting
As the brothers fall, Bahádring rushes deeper into the Well. Follow him!
Defeat Mûkh Bahora, the Mouth of Forgetting
'You look good enough to gobble up!'
Defeat Bahádring the Unmindful
Listen to Bahádring the Unmindful
Tûl Zakana, the Well of Forgetting -- Tier 1
'Wait, who are you again?'
'You will find nothing but ruin if you move further into the Well!'
Explore the marketplace of the Tûl Zakana, the Well of Forgetting.
'I will spin you into a meal for my young!'
'The well serves only me!'
'And as for you!'
'You claim my friendship, but you are no ally of mine!'
'There is not water enough to share.'
'You claim to trade in water but I see through you all.'
'By coming here you seek only your own obliteration!'
'My claws will find you!'
'You will find only your doom here!'
'Except for you. I remember you!'
'My blessings to you, my friend!'
'My friend, it's been too long!'
'My blessings to you, my friend!'
'My friend - it is so good to see you!'
'I almost didn't recognize you there, you prankster!'
Listen to the strange mutterings of Bahádring the Unmindful.
'Come to me, my children.'
'Rally to me, my children.'
'Rally to me, my children.'
'Aid me, my children!'
Bahádring's path leads you deeper into Tûl Zakana. Steel yourself for the dangers to come and press further into the Well of Forgetting.
Bahádring bestows his blessing on one of you and runs into the marketplace
'What bravery and nobility you possess.'
'You must very much want to get to the Well and know its secrets.'
Bahádring has run off again. You must be close to the Well itself. Can it really make you forget everything?
'Unfortunately for you, you are so, so far away.'
'I show you the future, the doom to come!'
'Did you know we are in Ambarûl?'
'It's so peaceful, so quiet.'
Your senses finally come to rest back at Tûl Zakana. You must press on
'Do you see it?'
'The marshes, the reeds, do you hear the zizanu's song?'
'It's so close.'
As Bahádring falls you remember where you are. You smash the well to rubble so its power cannot be used or corrupted by the evil of Men again
